name: Doodle Bounce
description:
A /D or Arrow keys to move left and right! 

Avoid the sharp doodles and bounce for points

Get combos by hitting the wall multiple times in the air before hitting the floor again to get a score multiplier!

The more points the harder it gets!  But also the harder it gets the more coins you can get!

Art, music, and game programming created by Chase of Bass

Created for Mini Jam
Theme: Doodle
Limitation: One Room
